ComicInfo.Summary:
THE ISSUE TO END ALL WARS!
Or at least, to end this one.
Will Deadpool's war destroy Earth? Or make him a bestselling author?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:23:36. [CVDB476783]
ComicInfo.Editor: Charles Beacham, Jordan D. White, Mike Marts
